statements: DELETE FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND confidence_level > 7;
DELETE FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_source = 'Malware Detection' AND feed_id = 2;
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Brute Force Attack';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Brute Force Attack';
DELETE FROM indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'IP' AND source_feed_id = 1;
DELETE FROM detections WHERE threat_score >= 80 AND is_mitigated = FALSE;
DELETE FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE id IN (SELECT source_feed_id FROM indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware');
